snippet.title: MNEMOPHOBIA: Deadline - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
MNEMOPHOBIA: Deadline is a freeroam horror game where you take the role of Ryan Arch, a eight years old boy going trough a chemotherapy treatment against cancer. Going through a difficult family situation with an abusive father, his internal battle becomes greater than expected when he glimpses the chance of a better future for the Arch family. Will you be able to face your worse fears and traumas and overcome the dilemma between life and death?

MNEMOPHOBIA: Deadline - https://gamejolt.com/games/Mnemophobia_Deadline/656283
MNEMOPHOBIA: Archives - https://gamejolt.com/games/MnemophobiaArchives/756306
MNEMOPHOBIA Gamejolt Community - https://gamejolt.com/c/MnemophobiaDeadline-43q74q
